ModMetaData.name: RimThedas: Metals
ModMetaData.author: TerraG
ModMetaData.description: Version 1.20 / This mod adds veridium, silverite, volcanic aurum, lyrium, folded lyrium, and meteorite ore from the Dragon Age series along with both versions of the starfang weapons. Compatable with Mines and Combat Extended. Recommended to play with oversized weapons but not needed. With special thanks to Vali'yra for the art and the rimworld community for their help fixing bugs!
